title: Casinos roll the dice on high-tech: Infographic
text: By Ashwani Mishra Movies make casino cheaters seem like modern-day Robin Hoods, but don't be deceived. In reality, casinos are better than ever at stopping theft thanks to artificial intelligence, Internet of Things (IoT) and a complex web of smart and advanced technology to nab cheaters before they can sneak away.Bitcoins are used to increase revenues; RFID chips are tracked making theft near-impossible, facial recognition system scans guests entering the gambling area and are compared with an ever-growing database of known cheaters and suspicious people while Big Data is deployed for improving customer experience. This infographic from PokerStars , explains why casino technology is more than a game. Image Source: billypen.com
